constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 65 (Monday, April 18, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MOORE of Alabama:
H.R. 7538.
=========================== NOTE ===========================
April 18, 2022, on p. H4448, right column, the following
appears: By Mr Moore of Alabama: H.R. 7638.
The online Record has been corrected to read: By Mr. Moore of
Alabama: H.R. 7538.
========================= END NOTE =========================
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the Constitution of the
United States.
[Page H4448]

latestAction.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H4519)

title: To provide the equivalent of a 6-month Federal income tax holiday for certain individuals.
